General.Name: Rcm Beteiligungs AG
General.Description: RCM Beteiligungs AG is a public investment firm specializing in real estate. The firm seeks to invest in residential real estate. RCM Beteiligungs AG was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Sindelfingen, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Martin  Schmitt
0.Title: CEO & Chairman of the Management Board
